inventory=[{"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 55, "index": 18}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 14, "index": 20}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 42, "index": 22}, {"type": "note_block", "quantity": 18, "index": 26}, {"type": "allium", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 31}, {"type": "blue_wool", "quantity": 54, "index": 32}, {"type": "spruce_trapdoor", "quantity": 11, "index": 36}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 9, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a bone block, I need to place 9 bone meal in the crafting grid. I will start by moving one bone meal from slot 43 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1
